params.text:
INTEGRATED NUTRIENT AND WATER MANAGEMENT

The application of either organic or inorganic fertilizer has to be done to supplement what soil could not provide which will contribute to better crop productivity. A recommended fertilizer rate per hectare or per hill is followed to avoid adverse effects on the plant and soil.

 

Application of Organic and Inorganic Fertilizers

          The amount of fertilizer to be applied depends on the result of soil analysis. The following are recommended fertilizer application for pole sitao production.

  1. Alternatively, apply two tons per hectare while preparing the field. 

  2. Apply complete fertilizer (10-15g per hill) before planting. 

  3. A month after planting, apply urea at a rate of 10-15 g/hill. 

  4. During flowering stage, apply muriate of potash at a rate of 10-15 g/hill. 

  5. Apply the same type and amount of fertilizer materials whenever necessary. 

  6. Organic liquid fertilizers can be sprayed weekly starting at flowering stage.

params.text:
WATER MANAGEMENT

The water requirement of pole sitao is 500-600 mm per cropping. Pole can tolerate drought due to its deep root system but application of water is necessary at critical periods of the crop during dry season. Irrigate the crop before and after planting, adequate water supply at flowering and pod setting for good quality of pods and quality seeds (planting materials). Do not water/irrigate the crop too much to avoid the incidence of flower drop and root rot.
